author: Minou Clark
title: These Memes Hilariously Sum Up Being Single On Valentine's Day
text:
These Memes Hilariously Sum Up Being Single On Valentine's Day Happy Singles Awareness Day! 02/10/2017 05:19 pm ET Minou Clark Associate Editor of News and Emerging Platforms, The Huffington Post 
For some, Valentine‚Äôs Day can be a romantic celebration of love. For others, February 14th is just another day of the single life. 
Here are some of the best memes on the internet for those of you flying solo. 1 A photo posted by Claudia Oshry (@girlwithnojob) on Jan 31, 2017 at 4:14pm PST 2 ‚Äî lauren (@Hemmxngs1996) February 7, 2017 3 me when i remember i'm gonna be single on valentine's day but then i remember this holiday is just a social construct & is meaningless pic.twitter.com/GJHaz8sauc A photo posted by My Therapist Says...
